entry.title: centos/fedro python3.7 install
entry.content: config compile enviroment1yum install gcc download latest source code1wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.7.0/Python-3.7.0.tgz extract the downloaded package1tar xzf Python-3.7.0.tgz compile python source code123cd Python-3.4.8./configure --enable-optimizationsmake altinstall check1Python3.7 --version otherswhen compile the source code , may be require zlib and ctype 123yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ yum -y install zlib zlib-develyum -y install libffi-devel
